articles.content: First-year Houston Rockets coach Stephen Silas said he had a "good conversation" with James Harden before the perennial All-Star's first practice of the season Monday, but they did not discuss Harden… [+2207 chars]

articles.title: LPL 2020 Semi-finals LIVE Updates- Jaffna Stallions made 165 for 9 in their allotted 20 overs. Dambulla Vikings need 166 to make it to the finals of the inaugral edition of Lanka Premier League. - InsideSport
articles.description: Jaffna Stallions in LPL Finals will play Galle Gladiators in Finals of LPL 2020. Stallions cruised through to the Lanka Premier League (LPL) 2020 finals. In the 2nd Semifinals on Monday evening Stallions defeated Dambulla Viiking by 37 runs.
